unnormalised: **Automotive Buzz: New Wheels Hitting the Indian Roads!**
normalised: automotive buzz new wheels hitting the indian roads

unnormalised: Folks, buckle up! The Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a tandoor oven in Delhi! Several new vehicles are launching this festive season.
normalised: folks buckle up the indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a tandoor oven in Delhi several new vehicles are launching this festive season

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra is rumoured to be dropping a souped-up version of the Thar, potentially called the "Thar Adventure." Expect more rugged features and maybe even a factory-fitted winch. Ooh la la!
normalised: first up Mahindra is rumoured to be dropping a souped-up version of the Thar potentially called the Thar Adventure expect more rugged features and maybe even a factory-fitted winch ooh la la

unnormalised: Tata Motors isn't far behind. Whispers suggest they're unveiling a revamped Nexon with a sleeker design, targeting the young crowd. Dr. Iyer from Pune University automotive department told us, "The competition is great for consumers. We're seeing real innovation."
normalised: Tata Motors isn't far behind whispers suggest they're unveiling a revamped Nexon with a sleeker design targeting the young crowd Dr Iyer from Pune University automotive department told us the competition is great for consumers we're seeing real innovation

unnormalised: Then there's the electric scooter scene. Ather is expanding its reach, with new dealerships opening up across Tier 2 cities. Ola Electric also promises deliveries of the S1 Pro Gen 2 are starting soon!
normalised: then there's the electric scooter scene Ather is expanding its reach with new dealerships opening up across Tier two cities Ola Electric also promises deliveries of the S one Pro Gen two are starting soon

unnormalised: Rumours also abound about a new Maruti Suzuki small car, potentially under Rs. 6 Lakhs. Could this be the 'Alto 2.0'?
normalised: rumours also abound about a new Maruti Suzuki small car potentially under rupees six lakh could this be the Alto two point zero

unnormalised: Finally, MG Motor India plans to launch an updated Hector with ADAS features. The new Hector promises a massive panoramic sunroof spanning 140 sq ft!
normalised: finally M G Motor India plans to launch an updated Hector with A D A S features the new Hector promises a massive panoramic sunroof spanning one hundred and forty square feet

unnormalised: Keep your eyes peeled and your wallets ready, folks! It's gonna be a crazy ride!
normalised: keep your eyes peeled and your wallets ready folks it's going to be a crazy ride
